nodes.text: The Sphere of Production and Logistics, also known as the Pyramid of Production and Logistics, was one of twelve Spheres of Influence of the Sith Empire. Headed by a Dark Councilor, the Sphere oversaw the Ministry of Logistics. The Minister of Logistics reported directly to the Dark Councilor at the head of the Sphere—a position filled by Vowrawn during the Great Galactic War and Cold War.
